entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Trail
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:37 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Warfield 8:00 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: NNW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening and after midnight. Rain mixed with wet snow beginning overnight. Snow level 1400 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Fog becoming fog patches overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:44 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with wet snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 6:44 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to 800 metres after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 6:44 PM PST Saturday 14 January 2023
